Title: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe
Body (HTML):
Experience the bright and floral notes of our premium Ethiopian Yirgacheffe coffee. Grown at high altitudes in the Gedeo Zone, this single-origin coffee features wine-like acidity, citrus undertones, and a clean finish that coffee enthusiasts love.

Tasting Notes: Lemon, Blueberry, Wine, Floral

Process: Washed

Altitude: 1,700-2,200m
Tags: ethiopian, single-origin, bright, floral, acidic, premium
SEO Title: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe - Premium Single Origin Coffee
SEO Description: Premium Ethiopian Yirgacheffe coffee beans with bright floral notes and wine-like acidity. Perfect for pour-over brewing.

Title: Guatemalan Antigua
Body (HTML):
Rich and full-bodied, our Guatemalan Antigua coffee offers a perfect balance of chocolate and spice. Grown in the volcanic soil of the Antigua region, this coffee delivers a complex flavor profile with hints of dark chocolate and warming spices.

Tasting Notes: Dark Chocolate, Cinnamon, Orange Zest, Nutty

Process: Fully Washed

Altitude: 1,500-1,700m
SEO Description: Rich and full-bodied Guatemalan Antigua coffee with chocolate and spice notes from volcanic soil.

Title: Colombian Supremo
Body (HTML):
Our Colombian Supremo represents the finest grade of Colombian coffee. Known for its well-balanced flavor and medium body, this coffee offers a smooth drinking experience with caramel sweetness and mild nuttiness.

Tasting Notes: Caramel, Almond, Mild Citrus, Balanced

Process: Washed

Altitude: 1,200-2,000m
SEO Description: Premium Colombian Supremo coffee beans with caramel sweetness and perfectly balanced flavor.

Title: Costa Rican Tarrazú
Body (HTML):
From the prestigious Tarrazú region of Costa Rica comes this exceptional coffee with bright acidity and full body. The high altitude and volcanic soil create a distinctive cup with citrus brightness and chocolate undertones.

Tasting Notes: Bright Citrus, Dark Chocolate, Brown Sugar, Clean

Process: Honey Process

Altitude: 1,200-1,900m
SEO Title: Costa Rican Tarrazú - Bright Honey Process Coffee
SEO Description: Exceptional Costa Rican Tarrazú coffee with bright citrus notes and honey process sweetness.

Title: Jamaican Blue Mountain
Body (HTML):
The crown jewel of coffee, our authentic Jamaican Blue Mountain offers an incredibly smooth and refined taste. Grown in the Blue Mountains at elevations up to 7,500 feet, this rare coffee is known for its mild flavor, lack of bitterness, and perfect balance.

Tasting Notes: Smooth, Mild, Perfectly Balanced, Subtle Sweetness

Process: Washed

Altitude: 1,000-2,300m
Tags: jamaican, blue-mountain, premium, smooth, rare, luxury
SEO Title: Jamaican Blue Mountain - World's Finest Coffee
SEO Description: Authentic Jamaican Blue Mountain coffee - the world's most sought-after coffee with perfect balance.

Body (HTML):

Body (HTML):
